resources.title: Monthly Budget Template
resources.description: A comprehensive Excel template for tracking monthly income, expenses, and savings goals. Includes automated calculations and visualization charts.

resources.title: Investing 101 Guide
resources.description: A beginner's guide to investing, covering fundamental concepts, different investment vehicles, and strategies for building a balanced portfolio.

resources.title: Credit & Debt Management Guide
resources.description: Learn about credit scores, responsible borrowing, and strategies for managing and reducing debt effectively.

resources.title: Savings Goal Tracker
resources.description: Track your progress toward multiple savings goals with this interactive spreadsheet. Features progress visualization and milestone tracking.

resources.title: Investment Calculator
resources.description: Calculate potential returns on your investments with this spreadsheet tool. Includes compound interest calculations and different investment scenarios.

resources.title: Emergency Fund Planning Guide
resources.description: Learn how to build and maintain an emergency fund, with worksheets to calculate your optimal fund size based on your circumstances.
